cab.content: ^---^bf^^^ ,J n^S E C R E T.BATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 20th MAY, 1918,It.. A. successful operation was carried out by the French north west of MONT KEKMEL in tho vicinity of BRULOOZE. It is reported that all objectives were gained, and about 300 prisoners captured.2% There has boon considerable artillery activity north and north east of MONT OTMEL, east of ALBERT, and astride the SOIvIME.3. Otherwise the general situation is unchanged.General Staff,War Office, SoW..l. 20th May, 1918.Issued at 12.15 p.m.
